name: SugarLand - A match 3 puzzle
description:
Just match the colors to remove them!
An easy and fun puzzle to play with in your spare time!

Let’s go on an adventure looking for sweets with the sweet-loving Chelsea!

Remove the sweets according to the conditions to get to the next stage!
In the special stages, feed Chelsea as many sweets as you can before the time limit!


■Have fun with SugarLand
・Connect to Facebook to check on your friends’ progress!
・You can also compete on the ranking!
・Never get tired with the different winning conditions for each stage!
・Use items to get advantages in the game
・More than 400 stages! Perfect to play in your spare time
・Play completely for free!

■Please note
This game can be played completely for free, but some items to get advantages during play can be bought in exchange for money.
*Read the terms of use for further details.
*Downloading this game means you agree to the terms of use.
